info.title: Dev Kit for AI API
info.description: API for Dev Kit for AI: Developer Toolkit for AI-Powered Web Applications

servers.description: Dev Kit for AI Production Server

get.description: Comprehensive health check for all system components
Detailed health check for database connectivity
Detailed health check for file storage system
Detailed health check for Redis PubSub system
Detailed health check with additional system information
List all developer keys for the current developer user.

schema.title: Response List Developer Keys Api V1 Auth Developer Keys Get

post.description:
Create a new developer key for the current developer user.

Maximum of 10 active developer keys per developer.

get.description: List all projects for the current user

schema.title: Response List Projects Api V1 Projects  Get

post.description: Create a new project for the current user

get.description: Get global statistics for all developer's projects with optional filtering
List all end users across all developer's projects with search and filtering
Get details of a specific project
Get statistics for a specific project with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new API key for a project. Requires project ownership.

get.description: List all API keys for a project

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api V1 Projects  Project Id  Api Keys Get

get.description: List end users for a project with search and filtering
Retrieve the Stripe payment configuration for a project including masked credential information.

schema.title: Response Get Stripe Config Api V1 Payments Stripe Projects  Project Id  Config Get

put.description: Create or update Stripe payment configuration for a project. Supports both test and live credentials.

delete.description: Deactivate Stripe payment configuration for a project. This does not delete existing subscriptions.

get.description: Get the webhook endpoint URLs to configure in your Stripe dashboard for test and live modes.

post.description: Validate Stripe API credentials by making a test API call to Stripe.
Create a Stripe checkout session for subscription or one-time payment. Returns a URL to redirect the user to Stripe's hosted checkout page.
Receive and process webhook events from Stripe. Configure this URL in your Stripe dashboard.

get.description: List all Stripe subscriptions for a specific project. Developer access required.
List all Stripe payment transactions for a specific project. Developer access required.
Get the current user's active Stripe subscription for the project.

schema.title: Response Get My Subscription Api V1 Payments Stripe My Subscription Get

get.description: Get the current user's Stripe payment history for the project.

post.description: Create a Stripe Customer Portal session for the user to manage their subscription, payment methods, and billing details.
Cancel the user's active subscription. Can cancel immediately or at the end of the current billing period.
Change the user's subscription to a different plan (upgrade or downgrade). Proration is applied by default.

get.description: List all subscriptions across developer's projects with optional filtering by project, test mode, and status.
List all payment transactions across developer's projects with optional filtering by project, test mode, and status.
List all developer's projects with their payment configuration status including test/live credential availability.
Get aggregated payment statistics across all developer's projects including subscription counts, payment counts, and revenue.
Root endpoint providing basic API information

Basic health check endpoint - delegates to comprehensive health check
For backward compatibility, this provides a simple health status

cancel_immediately.title: Cancel Immediately
cancel_immediately.description: If true, cancels immediately. Otherwise cancels at period end.

allow_existing_subscription.title: Allow Existing Subscription
allow_existing_subscription.description: If true, allows checkout even if user has active subscription

password.title: Password
password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long
